title: Online Ethics Education: Collaborative Case-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning literacy and elementary-level language education knowledge
context.additional_context: A course focused on resolving digital ethics issues that pre-service teachers may encounter in real language education settings.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five major ethical issues that may arise in online educational environments (e.g., data privacy, copyright infringement).
Learners can propose team-based solutions to real-world case-based ethical dilemmas through collaborative problem-solving activities.
Learners can simulate ethical decision-making processes using digital tools (e.g., LMS, collaboration platforms) and document reflections in a reflective journal.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
